header.title: Hi, I'm  Maria Del Mar Artunduaga

sobremi.title: About me
sobremi.description: I am a Full Stack Web Developer with knowledge in OOP, Databases, TypeScript, TailwindCSS, NextJs and ReactJs, in addition to other technologies, to always stay at the forefront with the most in-demand languages. I am responsible, autonomous, self-taught and a leader, which allows me to seek the best solutions to any problem. I love learning from different areas and I am sure I can contribute to the success of your company. Let's work together to make our dreams come true!

contact.paragrah: These are the means by which you can contact me, it is a pleasure to work together with you.
